title: Black Patcher
body:
Well last night I thought to myself "hmm maybe I'll play some league" I click on the league of legends icon and I get this.
I tried re installing the game and the same thing happened, I gave it a few hours the same thing happened.
I saw another post like this one on the NA boards with no answer so I though I'd bring a bit more attention to the issue.
Please reply ASAP
{{champion:84}} {{item:3041}}

replies.body:
You reply to comments by clicking the "Reply" button underneath them. Just putting another comment on the board **won't** alert that player that you've added another message. Also, bumps do nothing on the boards.

There is no attached screen-shot, if that's what you're referring to. Could you describe what exactly is happening?
Have you tried right click run as admin?
By the way I'm using a Windows 8 laptop.
